name: Highway Bike Rider
description:
Highway Bike Rider is an addictive game for the fans of racing and driving simulations games. Race at high speed, drive against traffic and overtake cars!
Enjoy 3D graphics with realistically created environments and amazingly detailed cars. This amazingly realistic racing car driving simulation game is packed full of super cool fast race cars and also has exciting, dynamic different racing environments. There are no limits in racing but only your racing skills! So drive as fast as you can, make sharp overtakes, do what you cannot do in real life, and finally race to your limits. Highway Bike Rider combines stunning, high fidelity graphics with addictive gameplay that will have you swerving through oncoming traffic, collecting power-ups, and knocking other racers off the road. Now download and Enjoy this 3d racing simulation game.
